starthere.name: Start here
starthere.description: Set out on your journey by building your own website, then move on to multiplayer games and collaborative web apps.

webdev.name: Web development
webdev.description: Learn how to make things happen on the web, from basic JavaScript to web APIs.

gamedev.name: Game development
gamedev.description: Learn to build games, both locally and on the web!

python.name: Python
python.description: Learn to use one of the most powerful and beginner-friendly languages.

ml.name: Machine learning
ml.description: Learn how to make machines learn with these fun projects!

java.name: Java
java.description: Learn Java, the language behind many mobile, web, and desktop apps. This course is also good for preparing for the APCSA exam!

hardware.name: Hardware
hardware.description: Bring projects from cyberspace to the real world with Arduinos and more.
